mapper.select: SELECT admin_id FROM ( SELECT @ids AS _ids, ( SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT( admin_id ) FROM admin WHERE FIND_IN_SET( admin_boss, @ids ) ) AS cids, @l := @l + 1 AS LEVEL FROM admin, ( SELECT @ids := #{adminId}, @l := 0 ) b WHERE @ids IS NOT NULL ) admin_id, admin DATA WHERE FIND_IN_SET( DATA.admin_id, admin_id._ids ) ORDER BY LEVEL, admin_id

select admin.admin_id,admin.admin_name,admin.admin_level,shop.shop_id,goods.* from goods left join shop on goods.shop_id = shop.shop_id LEFT JOIN admin on admin.admin_id = shop.admin_id where admin.admin_id = 1
